name: The Long Journey Home (itch)
description:
Made in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 50!

The Long Journey Home is a small chill adventure in the endless skies, you are a Courier, delivering mail to the islands along your path as you head back home. Your ship will decay while it is being used, and will eventually fail, you must deliver packages, earn gilders, and pay for repairs at the islands along the way.

Credits:
Art: Kait Peavler
Audio: Meghan Crosgrove
Programming: Nick Crosgrove

Controls:

  • Partial Controller Support. [W][A][S][D] / (Left Stick) to Move. 
  • (Mouse) / (Right Stick) to Rotate Camera. (Camera will not rotate while flying Airship).
  • [E] / (A) to Interact.

Note: We're aware that on certain machines people have reported a Fatal Error. We're working on a patch ASAP.
